name: Vortober 2022
description:
MAKE GAME FULL SCREEN

Click and drag the bottom corners of each page to flip through the book.

Press Esc to exit game

This is a digital flip book of all the drawings I made for the Vortober 2022. Every year for over 5 years, I partake in drawing a daily ink drawing during the month of October. All of these were created live on my Twitch channel. I stream 3 times a week 12pm EST come hang out https://twitch.tv/vorundor
